text: Dang wo jueding rang ta [su lai man] siwang shi, chule chi ta de shouzhang de zhuchong wai, meiyou renhe dongxi xiang tamen [jingling] xianshi chu ta yi siwang. Dang ta dao xia shi, jinglingmen cai huangrandawu. Jiaru tamen [jingling] neng zhidao wei jian zhi wu, name, tamen jiu bu hui jixu tingliu zai lingru de xingfa zhongle.
